players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Alice's death is tragic. We must analyze who benefits. Diana or Charlie, any insights?"
Diana: "I'm saddened by Alice's death. We should all share if we noticed anything suspicious last night."
Charlie: "I investigated Diana and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today."
You: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Diana instead of the player most likely to be mafia? This seems like an odd first move."
Diana: "Charlie, your accusation feels rushed and suspicious. Bob's right—why me first? We should question your motives before voting."
Charlie: "I am the detective. I investigated Diana and she is mafia. Bob, trust me - we must vote Diana out now."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Charlie

You: "I am the detective. I investigated Diana and she is mafia. Bob, trust me - we must vote Diana out now."
